articles.content:
President of Guinea-Bissau Supports Peaceful Reunification of Korea 
   Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Guinea Bissau highly praises the Korean people for making positive efforts to bolster the country's military muscle and achieve its prosperity thanks to the Songun policy and the single-minded unity and registering great successes in this cause. Joao Bernardo Vieira, president of Guinea-Bissau, said this when receiving credentials from the DPRK ambassador to the country on Dec. 12.
 Noting that the policy of the DPRK is sure to triumph as it relies on the united efforts of the people on the basis of the faith that one should believe in the people as in Heaven, the president expressed positive support to the efforts of the Korean people to peacefully reunify the country by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation in accordance with the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.

Wreath Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk 
   Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here laid a wreath before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Wednesday to mark her 89th birth anniversary and paid a silent tribute to her.
 Written on the ribbon of the wreath were letters reading "The revolutionary exploits of anti-Japanese war hero Comrade Kim Jong Suk are immortal!"

Choe Thae Bok Meets New Indonesian Ambassador
   Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with new Indonesian Ambassador Daulat Hotma Audison Passaribu who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Enjoy Performance Given by State Symphony Orchestra
   Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here enjoyed a performance given by the State Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre Wednesday on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 89th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
 Artistes of the prestigious orchestra put on stage numbers representing the immortal exploits performed by Kim Jong Il while making an endless long journey of Songun for the prosperity of the country.    
 Whenever they presented world famous music spiced with national flavor and sentiment through refined rendition made by peculiar mixed orchestra, the audience expressed deep admiration at the high artistry and attraction of the orchestra.
